subject: Baseball
Hedge Funds
lead_paragraph: Known for seeking companies with potential that others have dismissed, then betting on their long-term revival, David Einhorn said he would spend $200 million for a stake in the Mets.
snippet: Known for seeking companies with potential that others have dismissed, then betting on their long-term revival, David Einhorn said he would spend $200 million for a stake in the Mets.
